text: Lars Courtens (born 28 March 1995) is a Belgian korfball player. He is a member of KC Floriant Merelbeke and the Belgium national korfball team. With the national team he won the silver medal at the 2022 World Games in Birmingham, Alabama. ==Achievements== ===Club=== *Topkorfbal League champion (indoor), 1x (2022) *Topkorfbal League champion (outdoor), 1x (2022) ===National team=== ; World Games : 2022 World Games ; IKF World Korfball Championship : 2019 IKF World Korfball Championship ; European Korfball Championship : 2021 IKF European Korfball A-Championship ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian korfball players
title: Lars Courtens
